title: Bangyao (Brian) Zhao
text: Welcome to my personal website! I am currently in my third year of pursuing a Ph.D. in Biostatistics at the University of Michigan. My academic journey revolves around a passion for developing computational-efficient Bayesian models that address real-world challenges. My doctoral dissertation is focused on non-invasive EEG-based Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs). When not doing research, I like playing an ancient Chinese board game 围棋 (Chinese GO).

title: About
text: I am a human being who lives on the planet earth.
